title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Companion to Provent Dual Bracket Kit: Isuzu D-MAX MU-X 4JJ1-TCX 3.0L TD 4Cyl. 2012-16 – Fuel Manager Pre Filter Kit OS-37-FM

content.rendered:
Fuel Manager Pre Filter/Water Separator Kit
Isuzu D-Max (2012-2016) 3.0L TD
Turbo Diesel 4Cyl. DOHC 4JJ1-TCX

Isuzu MU-X (2012-2016) 3.0L TD
Turbo Diesel 4Cyl. DOHC 4JJ1-TCX

** DOES NOT incl. the Vehicle Specific Bracket !!
** COMPANION KIT: OS-PROV-37B

This kit is designed to also fit a Provent Catch Can kit, utilising one bracket for two very important uses and protecting your vehicle ! Fuel Manager is a unique, patented, modular diesel fuel filter/water separator system that can be customized for virtually any application. Each employ unique fiLation process, trapping more impurities and water without impeding the flow rate. The product’s design permits the replacement of elements without the use of tools and without spilling fuel, making service easy in the shop or in the field. When an element is replaced, an easily opened drain valve allows the filter to be completely and neatly emptied before it is removed.

Download PDF Installation Instructions >
